name: Dryad Spirit
description:
Spend Dryad to add 3 dmg. Attack Modifier.
If an opponent's Attack would inflict a Negative Status Effect upon you, you may spend Dryad at the conclusion of their Offensive Roll Phase to prevent that incoming status effect.

name: Heal Bot
description:
You may Activate this Bot up to two time after being Attacked with at lease 6 dmg. Upon activation, roll 1 die:
On 1-3, Heal 1.
On 4-6, Heal 2.

name: Mjolnir
description:
Begin the game with Mjolnir on your Hero Board.
You may Throw or Retrieve Mjolnir at any time by discarding a card. If an ability tells you to Throw or Retrieve it, you do not need to discard a card.
When you Throw Mjolnir, place it on a chosen opponent and deal 1 as an isolated source of undefendable dmg.
When you Retrieve Mjolnir, place it back on your Hero Board and gain Electrokinesis.
You cannot Throw Mjolnir at an opponent unless it is on your Hero Board. You cannot Retrieve Mjolnir if it is already on your Hero Board.
In a multiplayer game, if an opponent who has Mjolnir is defeated, Retrieve it.
shortDescription: Throw or Retrieve to gain bonuses

name: Nanobot
description: You may Activate this Bot during you Upkeep Phase. Upon activation, Detonate all Nanites.

name: Nyra
description:
Nyra has a maximum of 7 Health.
If you are being Attacked while Nyra is Active, you may choose to pass the full amount of this damamge to Nyra instead (unless the opponent is Attacking with their Ultimate Ability).
If Nyra receives damage, you may not use your Defensive Ability.
If Nyra is Active and you Offensive Roll Phase results in an Attack, increase that dmg by 2

name: Sapling Spirit
description:
Spend Sapling to Heal 1 and gain 1CP.
Spend Sapling and 1CP to draw 1 card.

name: Seedling Spirit
description: Spend Seedling to re-roll 1 of your dice

name: Shock Bot
description: If your Offensive Roll Phase results in an Attack, you may Activate this Bot. Upon activation, increase that dmg by 3. This Bot may never be activated twice in one turn.
